content: Celebrate the endless mediums of the entertainment universe at the annual 3 Rivers Comicon, connecting with fellow fans and meeting beloved icons.

Every year, the 3 Rivers Comicon brings together fans across many entertainment realms and launches an out-of-this-world event that’s filled with plenty of exceptional experiences. Don your best costume and meet the creators behind a variety of comic books. SupportPittsburgh’s arts sceneby unearthing new stories and artwork from local vendors and businesses. Whether you’re planning to meet a renowned storyteller or looking toshopfor one-of-a-kind merchandise, we have the ultimate guide to your comicon-centered itinerary.
David L. Lawrence Convention Center |1000 Fort Duquesne Boulevard

TIP:Attending this event with a beer lover? Reserve the weekend beer package with your ticket, which costs $75 for adults who are 21 years of age or older. For more ticket details, visit theofficial websiteof the 3 Rivers Comicon.

The convention center is in close proximity to sensational culinary options for diverse palates. Look through our guide on thetop places to eat in downtown Pittsburghand grab a bite before or after the convention.

Looking for hotels near the 3 Rivers Comicon? Explore flexible accommodations, budget-friendly prices, and comfortable amenities indowntown Pittsburgh, staying at a hotel that’s within walking distance to the David L. Lawrence Convention Center.
